attributes.action: Remove #uber from Horley town centre car park.
attributes.background: Help get #uber out of the Horley town centre car park.parents can't park to take their children to school. The car park is a disgrace with human waste from the drivers.

rejection.details:
You could raise this issue with a local councillor, who represents you. You can use this page to find out who your local councillors are, and how to contact them:

https://www.gov.uk/find-your-local-councillors
